ns0:entry.ns0:title: GoogleCloudPlatform/cluster-toolkit
ns0:entry.ns0:content:
URL: https://github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/cluster-toolkit
Language: hcl
Cluster Toolkit is an open-source software offered by Google Cloud which makes it easy for customers to deploy AI/ML and HPC environments on Google Cloud.

ns0:entry.ns0:content:
URL: https://github.com/cloudposse/terraform-aws-ecs-container-definition

ns0:entry.ns0:title: cloudposse/terraform-aws-tfstate-backend
ns0:entry.ns0:content:
URL: https://github.com/cloudposse/terraform-aws-tfstate-backend
Language: hcl
Terraform module that provision an S3 bucket to store the `terraform.tfstate` file and a DynamoDB table to lock the state file to prevent concurrent modifications and state corruption.
